title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer in Aqua Sky! As the #1 mixer brand in the world, you can trust the quality and performance of this hand mixer.

With the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer, you have the perfect speed for any task. From gently mixing in nuts and chocolate chips at speed one, to whipping up perfect meringues at speed five, this hand mixer can do it all.

Say goodbye to tangled cords with the lockable swivel cord that keeps it out of your way while you mix. And when you're done, removing the accessories is a breeze with the single-handed press of a button.

The thoughtfully designed Stainless Steel Turbo Beater ensures thorough mixing, and the best part? It's dishwasher-safe along with the other included accessories.

Compact and lightweight, this hand mixer is perfect for all your everyday mixing needs. With 5 speeds and 2 Turbo Beater Accessories, you have the power and control to mix up your favorite cookie dough, mashed potatoes, and so much more.

Whether you're slowly stirring in chunky ingredients or whipping up egg whites and heavy cream, the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer has got you covered. Don't miss out on this essential kitchen tool!
